resources.string:
🎉 Welcome to VocabApp – your English vocabulary learning companion! 🎉
This app is designed for learners of all levels – from absolute beginners to advanced users. With a friendly interface, rich vocabulary database, and flexible features, you'll have a powerful tool to build your vocabulary every day.


📌 1. Main Interface:
 - On the home screen, you'll see a scrollable list of vocabulary words.
 - Each item includes the English word, Vietnamese meaning, and IPA pronunciation.
 - Clean, simple UI optimized for all screen sizes.


📌 2. Using the List:
 - Scroll up/down to browse the vocabulary list.
 - Tap any word to view more details.
 - Words are grouped by themes to aid memory retention.


📌 3. Detail View:
 - Tapping a word opens a detailed view with pronunciation and meaning.
 - Swipe left or right to navigate between words.
 - Slide format helps continuous learning like flashcards.


📌 4. Multilingual Support:
 - VocabApp supports Vietnamese, English, and French.
 - The app automatically adapts to your device's language settings.
 - All text, buttons, and data are fully translated.


📌 5. Responsive Design:
 - Interface adapts perfectly to phones, tablets, and various screen sizes.
 - Works smoothly in both portrait and landscape orientations.


📌 6. Highlights:
 ✅ Easy to use, no account needed
 ✅ Offline access
 ✅ Learn anytime, anywhere
 ✅ Great for students, workers, and language lovers
 ✅ Clean, ad-free experience


📌 7. Quick Start Guide:
 - Open the app and choose a word
 - Tap to view details
 - Swipe to continue learning
 - Change language via system settings
 - Press "User Guide" to view this guide anytime


💡 Vocabulary Tips:
 - Learn a few words daily, consistently
 - Review old words regularly
 - Combine with listening/speaking practice


🙏 Thank you for using VocabApp! We hope you enjoy a fun and effective learning experience. Good luck on your English journey!

 — VocabApp Team ❤️
